titleStmt.title: The rates of the custome house bothe inwarde and outwarde the difference of mea[s]ures and weyghtes and other co[m]modities, very necessarye for all marchauntes to knowe, newly corrected and imprynted. Anno domini. M.D.L.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Commissioners of Customs.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Nycolas Hyl for Robert Toye dwelling in Paules church yarde at the sygne of the Bell,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Some pages torn and stained; all after A8 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Paules church yarde at the sygne of the Bell
